LanguageData.Apparello_Mojo.label: modest tribal Mask
LanguageData.Apparello_Mojo.description: Basic tribal mask, for that wooden impression.
LanguageData.Apparello_Mojotwo.label: gaudy tribal Mask
LanguageData.Apparello_Mojotwo.description: Makes you look ever so slightly more sociable.
LanguageData.Apparello_MojoFeather.label: tribal headdress
LanguageData.Apparello_MojoFeather.description: Tribal headdress or a foot bottom torturing device. It's very feathery
